title: How to Make Strawberry Soup

steps.headline: Rinse and hull the strawberries.
steps.description: Put two strawberries aside for the garnish later.

steps.headline: Blend the strawberries with the sugar, orange and lemon juices.
steps.description: Pour into a jug or bottle. Refrigerate for an hour or so.

steps.headline: Create a strawberry straw garnish.
steps.description: Slice the two strawberries into rounds of equal thickness. Skewer each slice through a toothpick, so that it sits in place like a lollypop.

steps.headline: Serve.
steps.description: The soup should be served chilled and fresh. Pour into a glass and add some ice cubes to each glass. Decorate with the strawberry straw garnish.

text: Rinse and hull the strawberries. Put two strawberries aside for the garnish later. Blend the strawberries with the sugar, orange and lemon juices. Pour into a jug or bottle. Refrigerate for an hour or so. Create a strawberry straw garnish. Slice the two strawberries into rounds of equal thickness. Skewer each slice through a toothpick, so that it sits in place like a lollypop. Serve. The soup should be served chilled and fresh. Pour into a glass and add some ice cubes to each glass. Decorate with the strawberry straw garnish.
